response.overview: A suspenseful coming-of-age story about a teenage girl determined to escape the constraints of her society. In a daring plan to fund her migration and gender transition, she decides to steal her grandmotherâ€™s gold. As the journey unfolds, Sheyda faces choices that redefine courage, identity, and the meaning of family in a delicate balance between dreams and reality.
response.title: For Sheyda
